Choosing the Right Sports Betting Site 7 Expert Tips for Success0:00/0:00Table of Contents Online Betting SitesFew things are as exciting as following an end-to-end sports game. You probably know the buzz that comes from watching Messi and Ronaldo battle it out for the three points or seeing LeBron James dominating the Finals. But did you know that you can easily double the excitement of any sports event out there by wagering on it at the best sports betting sites? And the best part is – it’s a child’s play to make it happen! At Betpack we share the passion for top-tier sports events and we want to give you a complete experience that will satisfy all of your senses. We recognise that betting on sports is a big part of sports today. As such we want to help you in your sports adventure by giving you access to wagering sites that offer an all-encompassing betting experience. Stay with us to find out which criteria we use to determine whether a betting site is first-class or second-rate. Knowing which features of a betting site you should focus on will help you find youral bookmakers instantly. Also we shed some light on the elusive aspects of privacy and security at betting sites here. We explain to you what makes a safe and secure bookmaker and how to recognise if a dubious betting site is trying to defraud you. Things such as bonuses deposit and withdrawal options and mobile betting sites will also come under scrutiny. Our Betpack experts also inform you how to get your hands on the best online betting offers how to make deposits and withdrawals and how to bet on the go. A complete guide with the most popular sports wagering events and competitions will also feature prominently here. Read on to get a thorough betting rundown.Best Betting Sites – How to Find Them?The best betting sites share some common features between them. They all have a valid license from a reputable regulatory body such as the UK Gambling Commission and utilise the latest in data encryption technology. Similarly the best online bookmakers also excel in the size of the sports wagering offer they give you. A top-notch betting site lets you bet on up to fifty different sports and allows you to place bets on hundreds upon hundreds of pre-match and live betting markets. The most reputable bookmakers also try to spice up each sports bet by rewarding you with enticing bonus offers. For the beginning welcome bonuses and risk-free bets feature prominently at all of these betting sites. Simply put these bonus offers can double your deposit or award you with a free bet if your original wager turns out to be a losing one. Another thing that most renowned bookies have these days is a top-notch betting app. Mobile betting apps are all the rage right now and they are taking the world of sports betting by storm. A top-tier wagering app makes placing sports bets effortless and facilitates your betting success. Lastly quality online betting sites must support your gambling adventure at all times. That is why they provide you with tons of payment methods to make deposits and withdrawals easy and also offer round-the-clock-customer service.Betting Site Offers: What Should You Expect?The most appealing aspect of betting on sports is getting your hands on some wagering funds courtesy of the online bookmaker. The betting site offers that you can get at the top wagering providers can take your gambling funds through the roof and reward you with some free bets in the process. And thanks to the competition bookmakers are quite generous with their online betting offers these days. In this sense they don’t only reward players bonuses when they sign up or when players make their first deposit. Moreover it is not uncommon for betting sites with offers to give away free bets and risk-free wagers and to boost your odds when you make larger combo bets. Experienced punters will always make the most of the online betting offers that online bookmakers ratings provide and we here at Betpack think that you should do too. Here are the most enticing bonuses that betting sites have right now and that you should use to increase your playing funds.Welcome OffersOnline bookmakers give you welcome offers when you open a betting account with them and deposit some money. Most welcome bonuses these days come in the form of bonus funds bet credits and free bets. In fact welcome bonus offers are the most exciting bonus out there as they are way more generous than the ones for the existing players. Bookmakers try to charm their new customers with their welcome bonus offers so they make them as lucrative as possible. It is not uncommon for a welcome bonus to double your deposit up to a given amount and that you have to admit is quite attractive. For instance a sportsbook might have a 100% deposit bonus which rewards new customers with up to £100 in bet credits. This means that if you deposit £80 on your first try the betting site will give you £80 in bonus credits. If you deposit £150 on the other hand you will get a maximum of £100 in bet credits.Pay Attention at T&Cs Before Activating a Welcome Bonus OfferHowever if you want to get the most of a welcome bonus offer you must read the fine print in the bonus Terms and Conditions (T&Cs). Betting sites will often try to make their welcome bonuses sound more appealing than they are. Seeing how no punter wants to be on the wrong end of a misleading bonus it is always best to read the bonus T&Cs before you activate an attractive-looking promo. Another reason why you should read the T&Cs of a bonus is the fact that they contain important information such as the minimum deposit amount and the promo code you need to activate the bonus. Promo codes are of particular importance. In a lot of betting offers you have to write a string of letters and numbers known as a promo code to activate the bonus. Trying to trigger the promotion without a promo code will mean that you need to start over with the process or miss out on the welcome bonus entirely.Bonus Wagering RequirementsOne of the crucial aspects that you must check when reading those T&Cs is what the wagering requirements of the bonus are. Wagering requirements tell you how many times you have to play the bonus funds through before you can withdraw your winnings obtained from said bonus funds. High wagering requirements mean that the sportsbook bonus credits will be more difficult to activate and winnings more difficult to withdraw. Ideally you want to play with welcome bonus offers that come with low wagering requirements. These low playthrough preconditions will be easy to meet and you will get those bonus credits much sooner. For instance a welcome bonus with a 2x wagering requirement will be a breeze to activate compared to a promo with a 4x wagering precondition. In the first case you will have to bet twice the amount you deposited to get your bonus credits. In the second one however you will have to play through your deposit four times before you can get your bonus funds.Sign Up OffersSign-up offers are similar to welcome bonus offers. As the name implies to get a sign-up offer you have to open a betting account at a sports betting site. This means that only new customers can get sign-up offers and they can only get them once when they first open their betting account. As we said sign-up offers are quite similar to welcome bonuses as they either match your deposit or give you a free bet. However unlike welcome bonus offers some sign-up promos don’t require players to deposit to activate the offer. This means that all you need to do to be eligible for a sign-up bonus is to open a sports betting account.Free BetsWho doesn’t love free bets? Whether as part of a first deposit bonus or as a reward for a punter’s loyalty free bets are excellent treats that let players bet with bookmakers’ money. So what is a free bet? Most of the time bookmakers won’t say here is a free bet go ahead and play with it. Instead they will give players £10 in bet credits for instance and will tell them to use the bonus funds to place one or more bets with the bonus money. They might also include some conditions that players have to meet to get the free bet. The betting site might say that players have to create an accumulator bet with a minimum of four selections and minimum ACCA selection odds of 4/1 (5.00) to be eligible for the bonus. Once players meet these conditions they can place their best free bets at UK bookmakers.Risk-Free BetsA risk-free bet is a similar betting offer to the free wager discussed above but with one small difference. When a betting site gives you a risk-free bet it says that if your bet loses you will get your money back in the form of bet credits that you can use to wager again. Let’s say a betting site informs you that you can place £100 on a risk-free wager (provided you meet the T&Cs of the bonus). If your bet wins you collect your winnings and the betting site doesn’t activate the risk-free bet. Otherwise though the betting site will give you £100 in bet credits that you can use on future bets. However as is the case with most bonus credits you won’t be able to withdraw the bonus funds from your betting account. You will only be able to place sports bets with them.Risk-Free Bet TypesThere are several types of risk-free bets. One is where you can use the risk-free bet credits the bookie gives you on only one wager. In contrast there is also a type of risk-free bet where you can divide the bet credits you get and place them on several different bet slips. When it comes to the betting options that you can use your risk-free bet on there are also two alternatives. A betting site can let you place your risk-free bet on only one sporting event also known as a single. Alternatively the betting site might say that you have to place an accumulator or parlay bet to get the free bet credits later.ACCA BoostsPlayers who want to get big winnings from modest stakes love accumulator bets or ACCA bets for short. An ACCA bet is when you include more than one selection in your bet slip thus increasing the odds of your wager. However you can increase those odds even further by using some of the ACCA boosts promotions that bookmakers offer. These parlay bonus offers will often increase your winnings by a certain percentage based on the number of selections you include in your bet slip. For instance a betting site might say that it will increase your winnings by 10% if you include four legs in your bet by 15% if you have five selections or by 20% if you total six picks in your combo bet.Security & Privacy at Betting SitesExperienced punters value security & privacy at betting sites more than other aspects of wagering. The protection of your personal data and the security of your banking details are always more important than marginally higher odds and better bonuses. In other words the first things that you have to cover when betting online are security and privacy. Only after you have established that the sports betting provider guarantees these you can start placing bets there. So how can you determine whether a betting site is confidential about your personal and financial data? There are two aspects that you need to check to verify that this is the case.Betting Sites Must Use Data Encryption and Have Valid Security CertificatesOnline sports betting operators must utilise the latest in data encryption and you should make zero compromises in this regard. Data encryption means that the site scrambles the financial data you enter so that no one can access or use it. This jumbling of information ensures that people with malicious intentions get nowhere near your sensitive financial data and your transactions still manage to go through without a problem. You can verify if a betting site uses reliable data encryption technology by clicking on the padlock symbol in your browser. When you do this a window will open and will tell you whether your connection is secure and the type of encryption the site uses. Another thing that you need to check is whether the site uses valid security certificates. Dubious betting sites can sometimes let their security certificates expire without renewing them. It goes without saying that this is not something you want to see at an online betting site. Expired certificates mean that unauthorised people can read the information you enter and that’s never good. As a rule you should only play at online sports betting providers that use at least 128-bit data encryption and posses valid security certificates from renowned organisations. If you do this you will always have your peace of mind when betting online.Read Privacy and Cookie Policy Terms & Conditions (T&C)Once you have covered that an online betting site is safe and secure you need to determine the type of personal information it collects. Most of the time betting sites only store information that helps them deliver a better user experience. However it is always smart to read the privacy and cookie policy before you start placing bets. Cookies terms and conditions inform you of what type of data the betting site collects. As such they provide valuable information that all bettors should read before they start betting. Reading these T&Cs is also important as players can often opt-out of a cookie setting or change it to their liking without it affecting their user experience. Cookie settings are not set in stone and players can often deactivate a setting and still get a decent sports betting experience.Payments at Online Betting SitesThe ability to make payments at online betting sites easily is another factor that you should take into consideration when choosing your betting provider of choice. Being able to deposit and withdraw without too much trouble will make placing bets more straightforward. It will also allow you to focus on the betting task at hand without worrying whether your money reaches your account or not. The best online betting sites always offer a variety of deposit and withdrawal methods to facilitate the simplicity of each sports bet you place. Read on to find out more about the betting payment methods that you can expect to see at top-tier online bookmakers and how you can deposit and withdraw at betting sites using them.Visa/MastercardMost sports betting enthusiasts these days deposit money into their accounts using Visa/Mastercard. Visa and Mastercard credit and debit cards are super-easy to use and as such they are excellent banking options when betting.Visa/Mastercard AdvantagesThe main advantages of using credit and debit cards as payment methods at online bookmakers include:Deposits arrive instantly;Fast withdrawals;Using them makes you eligible for various bonus offers.Visa/Mastercard deposits arrive into your account instantly. Most of the time money will be available within seconds after you have made the deposit. That’s great if you are trying to place a bet on a game that is about to start or if you are betting live and you want to reload your account funds instantly. Withdrawals are not as fast as deposits but they are still among the fastest when compared to other payment methods. You can expect to receive your winnings within a couple of days of making the withdrawal request. Lastly credit and debit card deposits also make you eligible for most bonuses out there. Most bonus offers list credit and debit cards as accepted banking options when you are trying to trigger them. That’s not always the case when depositing with some other payment methods. There are a lot of betting sites that use Skrill and other e-Wallets or prepaid cards.Visa/Mastercard DisadvantagesThe only disadvantage that comes to mind when you use credit and debit cards at online bookmakers is the fact that you have to reveal your financial information. You cannot deposit or withdraw without typing in your credit/debit card information and that’s not something that everyone is comfortable doing. However you have to reveal this information when you are making all online transactions using credit/debit cards so it will be nothing new or unexpected for card users.NetellerNeteller is one of the best and most popular e-Wallets out there. That’s why it's no surprise that you can find many betting sites that accept Neteller these days. With Neteller players can deposit withdraw and transfer money online instantly.Neteller AdvantagesOne of the biggest advantages that Neteller holds over other payment methods is security. The e-wallet is one of the best payment methods when it comes to securing your money thanks to the advanced encryption tools it uses and the 128-bit encryption it offers. It is also one of the fastest online payment options as it offers lightning-fast withdrawal times in addition to instantaneous deposits. When players deposit using Neteller their funds reach their account within minutes. More importantly though when customers ask for a withdrawal they can expect to receive their winnings as early as one hour after making the request and as late as twenty-four hours.Neteller DisadvantagesThe most prominent drawbacks to using Neteller are the fees that you have to pay. These range anywhere from 1% to 8% and can be quite a nuisance in the long run. Another disadvantage is the fact that access to Neteller is not the same in all countries. European customers for instance have much better access to Neteller compared to their North American counterparts.Depositing & Withdrawing with BitcoinBitcoin is a cryptocurrency that has taken the world by storm since its introduction in 2009. These days more and more betting sites are accepting the digital currency so it pays off to know more about it. To deposit and withdraw using cryptocurrency such as Bitcoin you first need to find yourself a reliable Bitcoin wallet. There are lots of Bitcoin wallets out there so you have to choose the one that you think will work the best for you. Once you choose a wallet making deposits and asking for withdrawals using the cryptocurrency is the same as any other conventional payment method.Bitcoin AdvantagesThere are several advantages to using Bitcoin at btc bookmakers. The first one is the security that you get. The blockchain protocol that Bitcoin operates on is virtually unhackable and that means that as long as you don’t make a mistake yourself your Bitcoins will be safe. Other Bitcoin benefits include the anonymity you get when you use the cryptocurrency and the low transaction fees.Bitcoin DisadvantagesDue to the nature of the blockchain system Bitcoin transactions can take quite some time to complete. That’s notal when trying to get your betting funds into your account as quickly as possible. However it is one of the trade-offs that most Bitcoin-using customers are ready to accept.Using PayPal as the Payment Method on Betting SitesPayPal is one of the most convenient payment methods to use at online bookmakers. It allows for industry-leading deposit and withdrawal times and also excels in protecting your financial information. The digital payment service has been around for quite some time. It is a tried and tested banking option that experienced players like to use because of its simplicity and reliability.PayPal AdvantagesPayPal stores your bank account or credit card numbers and doesn’t require that you enter them every time you make a deposit or ask for a withdrawal. This is one of the biggest advantages that PayPal has over other payment methods such as credit and debit cards. It makes PayPal more straightforward to use and not sharing your financial data adds another layer of security to each deposit or withdrawal you make. This security and simplicity make bookmakers who accept PayPal more appealing.  Other advantages of PayPal include the ability to sign up for free and the fact that you are part of one of the largest payment networks in the world.PayPal DisadvantagesOne of the most significant drawbacks to using PayPal at online bookmakers is the fact that withdrawals can sometimes take several days to complete. In addition to this many players have reported that they have problems reaching PayPal customer support as they always seem to be busy.How to Make a Deposit on a Betting Site?Depositing money into your betting account is the same as buying anything online. All you need to do is go to your sports betting account and click on Deposit or some other similar button. Once there choose the payment method you want to use. As soon as you have done that the betting site will ask you how much you want to deposit and will request you to enter information about your payment method. When you finish entering those pieces of information press Confirm and your deposit will arrive into your sports betting account within minutes.Asking for a Withdrawal Must Be a Piece of CakeWhen it comes to making withdrawals you first need to go to the section of your account called Cashier Cash Out Withdrawal or a similarly named menu. Once there select the withdrawal method you want to use (bank transfer e-Wallet etc.) enter the amount you wish to withdraw and press Confirm. As soon as you have done this your money will be on the way and you can expect to receive it within a couple of days. Most withdrawals take between two and five days to reach their destination.Betting TipsTo be able to place successful bets you need two things. First you need to find a quality betting site and then you need to listen to some top-notch betting tips. At Betpack we want to help you with both of these things. Most players can place decent bets and that’s a fact. However if you want to take your betting game to a new level you have to listen to what the experts are saying too. Sports betting experts have been in the business of predicting games outcomes for years. They know when an in-form team will go on a winning run and when a down-on-its-luck side will lose one game after another. Moreover these experts are predicting sporting events outcomes for a living and have more time to delve into detailed analysis about form injuries and suspensions than the average bettor. As such they are always ahead of the betting curve and when they share their betting tips the others should listen. At Betpack we know that even the most experienced punters can sometimes use a helping hand. That’s why we go out of our way to give our loyal readers only the best-researched tips out there. These tips in conjunction with the latest sports news we deliver should be a decentng point for you to make some educated predictions which will hopefully result in winning bets.Types of Betting SitesThese days there are so many types of betting sites out there that you can place any bet you can think of and then some. Moreover most of these betting sites offer betting on multiple sports meaning you can bet on all your favourite sports by opening an account at only one betting site. At Betpack we are firm believers that to get the most of your sports betting experience; you need access to the best online betting sites. As such we have gone to great lengths to review the creme de la creme of bookmakers and give you the best betting sites for each sport. Read on to find out the best bookmakers for the most popular sports out there.Cricket Betting SitesFrom Test Cricket and One Day Internationals (ODI) to Twenty20 cricket is one of the best sports if you are looking to place educated sports bets. Predicting a cricket outcome at cricket betting sites whether that’s the result of the match or an individual player’s achievement is more down to a punter’s knowledge of the game than it is to luck. As such cricket enthusiasts who follow and know the sport can make a handsome profit by betting on outcomes that they know will happen. Let’s look at some bets that the best cricket bookmakers offer right now.Cricket Bet Types and ExamplesIf you are an avid cricket fan and follow One Day Internationals why not capitalise on that knowledge? For instance if you know that India is going to win the ODI series with Australia why not back the Indians to triumph? ODI series between these two nations are always tight and backing any team will likely come with high odds. And high odds always mean decent winnings regardless of your bet stake. And that’s only the beginning. There are lots of other cricket bets that you can place to make following a cricket match more interesting. For example if you think that India’s Virat Kohli will dominate the series you can back him to be the Top Batsman. All cricket betting sites offer this market and it is an excellent opportunity to showcase your knowledge of individual cricket players. Moreover if you feel that Virat Kohli will be the best player in these ODI games you can also back him in the Man of the Match market. The odds here will likely be even higher as India’s finest batsman will have to fight it out with bowlers too. And speaking of bowlers there are cricket bets concerning their performances too. Punters can bet on Top Team Bowler and that bet can be a sure winner if they are backing bowlers such as the legendary James Anderson. Anderson is the all-time leading wicket-taker and has always been a favourite of experienced betting veterans. In keeping with that India – Australia example though backing Jasprit Bumrah to be the Top Team Bowler will be an equally intelligent bet too.Football Betting SitesFootball is by far the most popular sport in the world. If you came here to find the best football betting sites you are not alone. More importantly though if you came looking for the top football betting sites you came to the right place. There are millions of football betting enthusiasts out there and they all want to find the best football bookmakers with most competitive markets and odds. And all end up the same place to find them Betpack. Here we have the best betting sites for football including best World Cup betting sites.Football Bet Types and ExamplesIf you have ever visited a top-notch football betting site then you probably know that there are hundreds of different bet types in football betting. Players can bet on things such as the outcome of a football match the number of goals scored the half-time result which team will score first and so on. Choosing the right bet type can be the difference between having a winning and a losing wager. As such it is crucial to know which football bet types can produce the best profits for you. Let’s look at the most popular betting markets in football and how you can make the most of them.Match WinnerIn the match winner market as the name says you bet on the outcome of a football match. In other words you try to predict whether a football match will end in a home win away win or draw. As a rule of thumb if you want to place successful bets in this market you should do your betting homework. This means checking the form and previous head-to-head meetings of the two teams. If you notice that one of the teams comes into the match in great form then that team is a decent pick for your bet. Similarly if you see a pattern in the teams’ head-to-head duels in which one of the teams usually wins then that too is a decent indicator of which side to back.Goals ScoredThere are lots of so-called goals bets in football. You can bet on the total numbers of goals both teams will score the number of goals each team will score whether both sides will score and so on. If you are new to football betting these goal bets might be exactly what you are looking for. It doesn’t take a lot of football knowledge to predict that a Barcelona versus Liverpool game will end in Over 2.5 Goals. So instead of going through voluminous stats to predict which team will win why not just bet on the number of goals and enjoy the game? Placing a bet such as this one will make following that Barcelona – Liverpool game all the more exciting as you will root for goals to be scored regardless of which side scores them.Handicap BetsIf goal bets are the market of choice for novice football punters handicap bets are usually preferred by experienced betting veterans. In a handicap market one of the teams has to overturn an imaginary deficit that the betting site has assigned. At the same time the other team is the benefactor of an advantage given to them by the bookmaker. For instance when Chelsea play West Ham United in the English Premier League the Blues are the clear favourites to win and come with low odds. To balance things out and to offer higher odds to punters bookmakers level the scales by giving West Ham an advantage so the handicap market looks as follows: Chelsea (-1.5) – West Ham (+1.5) As you can see for the Blues to win in this market they will have to triumph with a two-goal difference. Of course this is much more difficult than winning in the match winner market. However if Chelsea do indeed win with that handicap punters will benefit from much higher odds. In contrast even if West Ham lose with a one-goal margin they will still be the winning pick in this bet.Basketball Betting SitesAt Betpack we facilitate all types of sports betting and basketball is high on our list of sports. The basketball betting sites that you can find here feature all the most popular basketball competitions and have some pretty obscure events too. Whether it is betting on NBA EuroLeague or FIBA Basketball World Cup basketball betting sites featured at Betpack have got you covered. They will make every crossover Steph Curry makes and every LeBron chases-down block all the more exciting by letting you bet on it. And can you imagine the excitement of having a bet on your favourite team to win and then winning courtesy of a buzzer-beater in the dying seconds of a game? These are the moments in which basketball shines in its full glory and with the help of the best sports betting sites found here you can bet on them and make them twice as exhilarating. There are not many bets that these sports betting operators don’t include in their offers. You can bet on the point spread market as most players usually do but there are tons of other basketball bets too. These include wagers such as various betting lines individual quarter betting match winner without a point spread point totals players betting markets etc. If you can think of a basketball bet the chances are that the bookmakers we list have it.Boxing Betting SitesBoxing bouts are some of the most exciting sporting events in the world. Lots of fans would have no problem staying up all night to wait for a competitive fight that takes place in the other corner of the world. And with the help of the best boxing sites found here at Betpack you can make those bouts much more appealing. Boxing has been around for ages and people have always bet on it. In the old days betting enthusiasts were gathered round the ring and placing bets right there and then. This was no doubt exciting but limited the number of punters who could bet on a fight. These days however things are different. You can bet on a fight taking place in Las Vegas while sitting comfortably in your armchair back at home and even have better betting options at your disposal. Moreover you can now bet on boxing events as they happen. You can place live bets as the fight unfolds see which fighter will edge it and adjust your bets accordingly. These betting options increase your chances of winning but also allow you to drink in each bout to the fullest. The list of betting sites that you can find at Betpack features some of the best boxing bookmakers out there. They let you bet on a variety of boxing bets and can satisfy even punters with the most discerning betting palates. The boxing bets that you can place at these online sports betting providers range from the easy-to-understand fight winner bet to more specific wagers. These include bets such as the method of victory round in which the fight will end whether the fight will go the distance and so on.Esports Betting SitesBetting on Esports such as Call of Duty Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS:GO) League of Legends (LOL) and Dota 2 is all the rage right now. This means that Esports betting sites are seeing an increase in traffic that is unlike anything they have seen before and the upward trend will likely only continue. But it wasn’t always like this. Only a decade or so ago placing bets on Esports was only possible at a limited number of specialised Esports betting sites and nowhere else. These were hard to find and not all of them were legitimate betting sites. However as competitive gamingd to increase in popularity and especially after the invention of video platforms such as Twitch more and more betting sites began offering Esports betting markets. Larger Esports crowds meant increased cybersports exposure and that in turn resulted in increased popularity of Esports teams and players. Esports franchises and organisations such as Fnatic Cloud9 Team Liquid NaVi are know as popular as football teams such as Manchester United and Real Madrid and probably have similar numbers of fans too. These days almost all bookmakers out there have Esports as part of their wagering offer. Moreover the Esports betting options are not only limited to the most popular games but include lesser gaming lights too. All of these competitive cybersports come with pregame and live betting markets and that’s another thing that puts Esports on an equal footing with more established sports such as football cricket and basketball.Esports Bet Types and ExamplesSo what bets can you place when betting on Esports? Well let’s say that you are betting on CS:GO one of the most regular fixtures at betting sites. First of all most reputable sports betting providers let you bet on CS:GO matches both in their pregame and live betting sections and they are both equally as enticing. An Esports punter playing at some of the betting sites we list at Betpack can bet on CS:GO markets such as:Match winnerCorrect scoreHandicap marketsTotal maps playedMap winnerTop-tier CS:GO matches come with as many bet options as basketball or tennis games and the same is true of other Esports games out there. What’s more players who love betting on futures can bet on the outright winners of prominent Esports tournaments as well. This means that if you have a guaranteed Eleague or FaceIt tournament winner you can back it with a futures bet just like you would back the Lakers to win the NBA title or Djokovic to triumph at Wimbledon.Horse Racing Betting SitesThe oldest form of betting is wagering on horse races. Horse race betting is still going strong today and there are lots of high-quality horse racing betting sites out there. You can find the best of these horse racing bookmakers right here at Betpack. If you are a horse racing enthusiast you probably know that the number of horse racing events is now higher than ever. A race is being run at a five or ten-minute interval and horse racing punters are spoilt for choice. This is because horse racing betting sites now offer races from around the world something that was not the case a couple of decades back. Back then you could only bet on the races happening locally and even then you had a limited pool of bets. So what horse racing events can you bet on when you visit online betting sites? UK horse racing extravaganzas such as The Derby at Epsom The Cheltenham Gold Cup and The Grand National for instance always feature prominently at betting sites. Similarly US blockbuster races such as the Kentucky Derby Preakness Stakes and the Breeders’ Cup are always at the top of betting offers too. The Australian Melbourne Cup the Grade 1 Japan Cup as well as the Irish Derby and the Irish Champion Stakes are all super-popular horse racing events that most bookmakers include as well.Horse Racing Bet TypesHowever these world-renowned events are only the tip of the iceberg when it comes to the horse wagering offer found at the best online betting sites. Hundreds of other less illustrious racing events are part of the horse betting options at bookmakers too. The betting sites listed at Betpack offer everything from Flat and Jump Racing to Harness and Stakes Racing. If a horse race is run in a distant corner of the world you can rest assured that the best sites for betting will have it. The same is true when it comes to the horse racing bet types available. Most horse racing betting providers we link to offer wagering on the race winner or the horse which will place. They also let you include exotic bets in your bet slips such as exacta trifecta quinella and superfecta. Some of these wagers come with incredibly high odds and can take your betting account tally through the roof with only one win.Political BettingOne of the best new inventions of online wagering is political betting. This new form of betting allows you to bet in super-popular political events from around the world. This means that you can bet on the outcome of the US presidential election even though you are in the UK Sweden or some other country. Similarly you can bet on the result of the UK General Election at any online bookmaker offering the market. In other words you don’t have to go to specialised UK betting sites to place your political bets. You can do that by opening an account at any of the best political betting sites we list here. At Betpack you can find an extensive list of betting sites that offer wagering on politics in addition to sports. You can place bets on the Danish General Election the Brazilian race for president the Australian Federal Election the run for US Senate and so on. If you are a politics buff and a political pick strikes your fancy the betting sites we list at Betpack will instantly deliver.Events to BetThese days the betting offer that bookmakers are laying on the table for bettors is more extensive than ever before. Each day there are hundreds of different events to bet on and more and more new sports competitions are entering the betting fray. It’s easy to see how easily can make the most of such a comprehensive betting offer especially if you are an experienced betting veteran. Good punters used to win lots of money decades ago when bookmakers gave them only a dozen games to choose from. Punters back then still found ways to successfully compile a winning accumulator bet slip even when they were presented with such a limited betting offer. So what’s stopping you from placing a winning single or accumulator bet today when you have thousands of events to choose from? With so many sports games and bets on offer you can focus on the ones that you know the most about and then place the bet that you are comfortable with. Even a betting beginner can compile a potentially winning bet slip with the extensive list of sports betting events that bookmakers are offering these days. After all who hasn’t heard of illustrious sporting events such as the Champions League or the NBA Playoffs. These are events that are available on cable terrestrial and satellite TV and there are hundreds of Internet-based services that stream these events all the time. Here are some of these super-popular events that you can bet on when you open your betting account.Champions League (CL) BettingEuropean football fans love nothing more than hearing the CL anthem on a Tuesday or Wednesday night. CL football games are by far the most popular matches during the season and that goes double when those elimination matches start. Watching the likes of Barcelona Real Madrid Juventus Bayern Munich and Liverpool on one night is inviting enough. However watching those teams fighting it out for the three points almost every week makes the whole CL experience much more appealing. And then you remember that you can bet on those games with the help of Champions League betting sites . Can midweek football get any more exciting than that? CL games come with more than a hundred betting markets such as match winner handicap markets goal totals to score first and so on. When you factor in that you can also bet on which player will score a goal what the correct score will be how many red/yellow cards the referee will show you instantly see why so many football betting enthusiasts can’t wait to hear that CL anthem to start.English Premier League (EPL) – The Greatest Football Event to FollowWhile we are talking about the most popular football competitions we must mention the EPL. The English Premier League is the most prominent league competition in the world and it features some of the best football teams such as Liverpool Manchester City Chelsea Manchester United and Tottenham. It also features fifteen other sides that may not have the same financial muscle as the five above but never lack the courage and determination to compete. That always makes for some super-exciting EPL match-ups and rivalries. English fans have the privilege of watching these games week-in week-out and then talking about and relieving them until the next round of matches comes. Football betting enthusiasts enjoy these same privileges but can also make decent profits from following top-tier English football. Betting on the EPL is an experience unlike any other to say the least. In English football mega-rich squads can put seven or eight goals past their opponents when things go their way and betting on those outcomes comes with some exorbitant odds. However only the most perseverant and determined sides can get away without a defeat on a rainy night in Stoke Newcastle or Burnley and those surprise results also come with sky-high odds that punters can pounce on. In England everyone can defeat everyone and that is the major reason for its population.NBA Betting – Spice Up the CompetitionIf you are looking to place a bet on top-quality basketball events then you cannot go wrong with the NBA. The NBA is the most popular basketball competition in the world and the majority of NBA games are worth spending the night awake if you are watching from across the globe. However if you want to get the most excitement for the bets you place then you have to wait for the NBA Playoffs to start. These feature the best teams from the Eastern and Western Conference and are a real basketball delicacy. Betting enthusiasts who love basketball can place some quality bets once these playoff games commence. Whatever precaution teams used up until then goes out the window when the playoffs start and that presents an excellent opportunity for winning basketball bet slips. NBA betting enthusiasts can bet on both individual games or futures. This means that punters can bet that the Miami Heat will win their first playoff game against the Boston Celtics but they can also bet that the Heat will win the Eastern Conference or the NBA title. Today’s betting sites have such comprehensive NBA betting offers that one has to visit them to see how great the number of available bet types is.ICC Cricket World CupThe ICC Cricket World Cup is the premier international cricket competition. It features the best cricket nations in the world and is the most coveted cricket tournament out there. Betting enthusiasts love the ICC Cricket World Cup too. Experienced bettors can’t wait for the likes of England Australia India and New Zealand to start fighting it out for the title of the best cricket nation in the world. In fact they rarely wait and do nothing before the tournament. Instead they place one futures bet after another and predict which team will win but also bet on who will be the Man of the Tournament as well as who will score the most runs or take the most wickets. Once the tournament those futures bets are still in play but take the back seat. When the business end of the ICC World Cup commences punters begin to bet on individual matches in both pregame and live betting markets. They bet on the match-winner the top batsmen top bowler as well as the correct score of games. Bookmakers also try to come out with World Cup special bets during the pinnacle cricket tournament to spice things up on their end too. They offer punters the chance to bet on games with higher odds give them enticing cricket bonuses boost cricket accumulators and come up with many other promo offers.New Betting Sites – A New Land to DiscoverThe online sports betting industry is growing all the time and that means that new betting sites are joining the scene regularly. These new betting sites have all the features of their older and more established counterparts and compete hard to find their place in the sun. This usually means offering a better sports betting offer than their older betting brothers consisting of more sports more bet types and more bonuses. Most of the time that’s enough of an invitation for experienced players who instantly see the perks of these latest betting sites and want a piece of the action. However because these new betting sites are still unproven to an extent some sports betting enthusiasts are not quite sure whether they should trust them. They want to know if a new betting site is reliable before they start placing their bets there. So how can you determine if a new betting site is a legitimate business? Well the first thing that you need to look for is a license. For instance if a new betting site is in the UK you want to see a license issued by the UK Gambling Commission which regulates all UK betting sites. Another thing that can help you determine the reliability of new betting sites is security. Always check whether these sports betting providers utilise data encryption technology and have the latest security certificates. If these two things check out you can rest assured that the new betting site that you are dealing with is indeed a reputable gambling provider that won’t run away with your money.Mobile Betting SitesThe ability to bet on the go is very important to players today. To meet this demand most bookmakers if not all have come up with mobile betting sites that complement their desktop betting options. At Betpack we are firm believers that a top-quality mobile betting site is a must-have for all online bookmakers. Being able to place sports bets using a mobile device is crucial for several reasons. First of all you can bet on sporting events that you would otherwise miss out on. For instance you might want to bet on Japanese football but you are not able to because matches in Japan play out during office hours. However if you have access to a mobile betting site you can use your lunch break to compile a potentially winning bet slip on your mobile with ease. Mobile betting sites also allow you to make the most of your live bets by betting on a game while watching it as it happens. It is often not possible to turn on a desktop computer and bet on live sporting events but if you use a mobile you can place any in-play bet you can think of in an instant. Lastly when you use mobile betting sites you can navigate the bookmaker’s site with greater ease than when using a desktop browser. Mobile betting sites are created with functionality in mind because if they weren’t it would be impossible to find your sporting event of choice or place your bet. Navigating a mobile betting site is pretty straightforward and save for some rare cases where bookmakers overcomplicate things placing bets via a mobile betting site is a real breeze.Online Betting AppsOnline betting apps are an improvement on mobile betting sites. An online betting app allows you to enjoy all the perks of mobile betting and then some. Almost all top-tier bookmakers have a quality app and the sooner you start using one the better. So what are the advantages of using a quality mobile app? Well there are several crucial benefits that you get when you place your sports bets using one of best uk betting apps.Improved User ExperiencePlayers who use a reputable betting app get an improved user experience in several betting aspects. The first aspect is the increased functionality they get. Bookmakers create apps so that they simplify players’ user experience in all steps of their betting adventure. In other words it is easier to open a betting account using a mobile app just as it is easier to activate a welcome bonus. Similarly you can find your desired sports bet via an app within seconds and place your stake even quicker. That’s not always the case when you are placing your bets through a betting website. And if something goes wrong you can contact customer support in just one click using your mobile app. When the bookmaker’s help desk resolves all of your issues you can withdraw your winnings instantly via the app too. A quality sports betting app offers an improved user experience across the board.Betting App Bonus OffersAnother perk of using a mobile betting app is the ability to activate various bonus offers with it. Players can activate all bonuses using a desktop or mobile device but most of the time it is much easier to trigger a bonus using a betting app. For instance if a sportsbook offers bet credits for new customers players can activate that promo offer either by using their desktop devices or by using the easier alternative their mobile phones or tablets. Sometimes however players can activate a bonus offer only by using a mobile app. For example an online betting site might offer £20 in free bets for all new customers who download their app and £30 in free bets when they make their deposit and place their first bet on it. This bonus will only be available to new customers who are betting via the app and desktop users won’t be able to activate it.Mobile Deposits and WithdrawalsBookmakers create betting apps to improve the overall user experience. As such they tend to make the deposit and withdrawal process much easier for players. Choosing a credit card or an e-Wallet from the list of payment methods is as easy as you want it to be when you use a betting app. Similarly entering the amount you want to deposit or withdraw takes less time than it would if you were doing the same on a betting website. And just like in the case with bonus offers some payment methods are only available when you use the betting app and not a desktop computer. Lots of mobile-only banking options are now popular in the sports betting industry and you need to have a mobile device to deposit or withdraw with them.Customer SupportCustomer support is a crucial aspect of all excellent sports betting providers and is another factor that separates the bookmaker wheat from the chaff. A sports betting operator can offer all the sports and markets in the world. However if it doesn’t provide the support that you need at every step of your sports betting adventure then it will never be able to say that it is a top-notch online betting site. So which things should you cover to determine whether a sportsbook has a top-quality customer support service? The first thing that you need to look at is whether the betting site’s help-desk operates 24/7. Round-the-clock customer support service is crucial if you want to know that whenever you experience a problem someone will be there to help you with it. The second factor that you should look for is how many channels of communication has the bookmaker enabled. If you can reach customer support only via email the chances are that you are dealing with an inferior betting site. On the other hand if players can communicate with customer support via live chat email phone and website contact forms then they are likely dealing with a reputable sports betting provider. If that sports betting provider also has a comprehensive FAQ section that’s even better.SummaryBetpack is the leading online sports authority and the same is true when it comes to sports betting. Our experts have extensive knowledge of the sports betting industry and it wouldn’t be a mistake to go with what they are advising. We boast the most comprehensive list of betting sites and provide detailed reviews that can help you in your sports betting adventure. When you are looking for thatal sports betting provider you have to make sure that it ticks several boxes. First you want a betting site to have a valid license from a reputable regulatory body and to adhere to the highest security standards. Secondly the best online betting operators need to enable a wide range of payment methods. You want to bet at bookmakers that offer a variety of credit/debit cards e-wallets prepaid cards and cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin are also a plus here. Most players these days determine the quality of a sportsbook by the sports betting offer it has and they are right to do so. The number of sporting events bet types and the quality of bonuses are all crucial when looking for a superb betting experience. Round-the-clock customer support service is important as well. If a website has it you will rest assured that you will have someone to help you at all times. Lastly mobile betting options are also something to have in mind. A top-quality app can improve your sports betting substantially and finding one should be paramount. So there you have it. If a betting site ticks all of these boxes it probably is an excellent choice for your next bet. Start betting with the help of Betpack and never miss a winning bet again.Continue ReadingFrequently Asked QuestionsWhat is the best betting site?The best betting site is the one that covers everything a punter needs. Simply it must have tons of sports to bet on boasts hundreds of betting markets and offers a variety of enticing bonuses.What's the best online betting site in the UK?The best betting sites in the UK have a license from the UK Gambling Commission and use advanced security protocols to ensure the safety of your deposits. In terms of the betting offer the best online bookmakers in the UK have both prominent and obscure betting events and let you bet on pregame and live wagering markets. Furthermore they offer a handful of bonuses to deliver a top-notch experience.Which gambling site has the best odds?Gambling sites that operate with the lowest bookmaker margins have the best odds. This margin tells you the profit the bookmaker makes from the odds for a given event. The lower the margin the better the odds. You can easily compare them at Betpack to find the best one for you.How many betting sites are there?There are thousands upon thousands of betting sites out there. However not all of them are worthy of your deposits and bets. Finding the best betting sites can be tricky. If you buy a domain and are unhappy with it we will accept the return within 30 days and issue a full refund – no questions asked.Quick delivery of the domainIn most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.Safe and secure shoppingYour online safety and security is our top priority. We understand the importance of protecting your personal information.We protect your information through SSL encryption technology providing the safest most secure shopping experience possible. Additionally you may checkout with PayPal or Escrow.com.FAQsSee more FAQsHow do I transfer to another registrar such as GoDaddy?Yes you can transfer your domain to any registrar or hosting company once you have purchased it. Since domain transfers are a manual process it can take up to 5 days to transfer the domain. Domains purchased with payment plans are not eligible to transfer until all payments have been made. Please remember that our 30-day money back guarantee is void once a domain has been transferred. For transfer instructions to GoDaddy please click here.How do I get the domain after the purchase?Once you purchase the domain we will push it into an account for you at our registrar NameBright.com we will then send you an email with your NameBright username and password. In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.What comes with the domain name?Nothing else is included with the purchase of the domain name. Our registrar NameBright.com does offer email packages for a yearly fee however you will need to find hosting and web design services on your own.Do you offer payment plans?Yes we offer payment plans for up to 12 months. See details.How do I keep my personal information private?If you wish the domain ownership information to be private add WhoIs Privacy Protection to your domain. This hides your personal information from the general public. To add privacy protection to your domain do so within your registrar account. NameBright offers WhoIs Privacy Protection for free for the first year and then for a small fee for subsequent years. Whois information is not updated immediately. It typically takes several hours for Whois data to update and different registrars are faster than others. Usually your Whois information will be fully updated within two days.See more FAQsYour Web address means everything – watch our video see whyYour Web address means everythingwatch our video see whyOther domains you might likeRioBets.com▸ See domain$3395BetsTo.com▸ See domain$3095BetsGA.com▸ See domain$2495Quick statsDomain length7 charactersKeywordsBets WarBase domainBetsWarTLD extension.comBetsWar.com▸ Buy now▸ Start Payment PlanShopHomeCategoriesPayment plansMy accountSafe and secureMoney back guaranteeEscrow.comNameBright.comTestimonialsHelpful TipsBuying guideCase studiesFAQsAbout usOverviewContact usTerms and conditionsPrivacy policyTalk to a domain expert: +1-303-893-0552© 2023 HugeDomains.com. Please remember that our 30-day money back guarantee is void once a domain has been transferred. For transfer instructions to GoDaddy please click here.How do I get the domain after the purchase?Once you purchase the domain we will push it into an account for you at our registrar NameBright.com we will then send you an email with your NameBright username and password. In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.What comes with the domain name?Nothing else is included with the purchase of the domain name. Our registrar NameBright.com does offer email packages for a yearly fee however you will need to find hosting and web design services on your own.Do you offer payment plans?Yes we offer payment plans for up to 12 months. See details.How do I keep my personal information private?If you wish the domain ownership information to be private add WhoIs Privacy Protection to your domain. This hides your personal information from the general public. To add privacy protection to your domain do so within your registrar account. NameBright offers WhoIs Privacy Protection for free for the first year and then for a small fee for subsequent years. Whois information is not updated immediately. It typically takes several hours for Whois data to update and different registrars are faster than others. Table of contents20 Best betting sites 2023 – list of online bookmakers How to Choose a Betting Site? Latest Betting News Our Pick: Top UK Betting Sites – List of Online Bookmakers Featured New Online Betting Sites Comparing Different Betting Sites How Do You Open an Account With an Online Bookmaker? Our Top 10 Betting Sites by Category 2023: Popular Sports You Can Bet On Meet out team Best Betting Offers Licensing Associations for Punter’s Pub Responsible Gambling Betting Guides FAQ How to Choose a Betting Site?Below we’ve listed the main features we look at when judging the quality of a betting site. These factors go a long way to deciding which bookies make the cut as ones we endorse and recommend to you. Or ones we don’t.It’s not an exhaustive list.Whether the site has a useful and knowledgeable blog and whether it’s a part of GAMSTOP would be other factors worthy of consideration. But these are the crucial ones. The more of these features the bookie has and the higher the quality of them the better.#1 -Trustworthiness & ReputationHolding a respectable gambling license (see below) and being trustworthy are connected. But they’re not necessarily exactly the same thing. Holding the license means the betting site has ticked the necessary boxes in order to be granted one. But the proof is really in the pudding when it comes to what customers make of the betting site. Betting forums comments sections and other publicly-available content are a good indication of what customers really think of a site when it comes to trustworthiness and reputation. After all they should know.#2 – Safety & SecurityAlmost all betting sites operate with a gambling license. Not only do we completely ignore those who don’t but we only work with betting sites who hold the most respectable and trusted one. That’s the UK Gambling Commission license.#3 – OffersThese days you can’t expect huge generosity when it comes to welcome offers. Gone are the days of the huge deposit bonuses with relatively low wagering requirements. So even though some welcome offers are a bit better than others they can be a bit samey. A better metric are the ongoing offers to existing rather than new customers. A good and regular supply of deposit bonuses free bets cashback offers odds boosts and other bonuses do allow the best betting sites to trump the competition in this regard. And the lower the wagering requirements on the bonuses the better.#4 – Betting MarketsNot everyone wants to play the most popular markets on the most popular sports such as football and horse racing. We reward UK betting sites who cover the more obscure sports as well. Such as surfing chess handball badminton or field hockey. Plus the so-called ‘specials markets’ on topics like politics reality TV shows and the Oscars. And within those sports we look for plenty of variety in the markets. Take football for example. These days punters want to bet on the number of offsides shots on target or fouls committed by a player in addition to the mainstream ones.#5 – Deposit & Withdrawal MethodsGetting your money in and out of your betting site is crucial. And when it comes to payment methods it’s primarily a case of ‘the more the better’. The greater the number of options including debit cards E-wallets cryptocurrencies and bank transfers the greater the choice for the customer.Then there’s timings. Deposits should for the most part be instant. Withdrawals should be expected to take a bit longer but the faster methods like E-wallets shouldn’t take more than a day while it’s unreasonable if bank transfers take more than four days.#6 – Betting apps and mobile bettingIn an age when we’re all so dependent on our phones there’s no excuse for online betting sites not having a top mobile product whether via a browser or an app. If anything the mobile product should be even better faster and easier to use than the laptop/desktop version because punters tend to prefer using their mobiles. The mobile version should also allow you to bet deposit withdraw and do everything else you can do on your computer.#7 – Competitive OddsAny pro punter will tell you that the single most important aspect of a betting site are the odds on offer. Getting short-changed on sports odds is the quick way to the poorhouse. The reason is that everyone will inevitably lose plenty of bets so you need to maximise your payouts when you do win. Take a leaf out of the pros’ book and compare the odds your bookie is offering on a particular bet compared to the competition. If they’re too low don’t bet. Or if it happens very often it may be time for a change of bookmaker!#8 – Customer SupportWith the best will in the world sooner or later you’re going to need to get in touch with Customer Support at a betting sites. Common issues include problems depositing and withdrawing or clarification on market rules. And for this you’ll want a Customer Support team that’s knowledgeable friendly available 24-7 and which can be reached via different methods. Like phone Live Chat or email.#9 – Live Betting and Live StreamingAny betting site worth its salt will offer live betting on just about every sports event they have pre-match betting on. But some are better than others. The best online betting sites in the UK have high in-play betting odds endless markets and are quick to update their live betting odds. It’s also a big bonus if they offer plenty of Live Streaming across numerous sports free of charge and with good quality pictures.#10 – Best Odds Guaranteed (BOG)A relatively new addition to online sports betting. BOG allows customers to have two bites of the cherry at getting the best odds on UK and Ireland horse racing. And in rare cases greyhounds as well. If a customer places a bet on a horse at bigger odds than its Starting Price and the horse wins they’ll be paid out at the early odds. If the Starting Price ends up being bigger than the early price and the horse wins they’ll get paid out at the Starting Price. Even though most of the best betting sites offer it not all offer it on ALL UK and Ireland races.#11 – Bet Builder MarketsAn increasingly popular type of bet is the Bet Builder. It’s a type of Acca made up of selections taken from the same match normally football. While most betting sites offer it some have better Bet Builder products than others. The best ones offer it across less-popular leagues and allow you to combine a greater variety of bets within the same Bet Builder.Latest Betting NewsEvens Philadelphia Eagles to get back on trackRuss
